verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> ' According To The <S%G2596><s%> Command <S%G2003><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G4990><s%> Our Saviour, <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1680><s%> Our Hope, <S%G2257><s%>

To Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> My True <S%G1103><s%> Child <S%G5043><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith; <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> Mercy, <S%G1656><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Father <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord. <S%G2257><s%>

Even As <S%G2531><s%> I Besought <S%G3870><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Remain <S%G4357><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus, When I Was <S%G2181><s%> Going <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Thou Mightest Charge <S%G3853><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Teach Other Doctrines, <S%G2085><s%>

Nor <S%G3366><s%> To Give Heed <S%G4337><s%> To Fables <S%G3454><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Genealogies <S%G1076><s%> Interminable, <S%G562><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Questionings <S%G2214><s%> Bring <S%G3930><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Administration <S%G3622><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Charge <S%G3852><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> A Heart <S%G2588><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Unfeigned; <S%G505><s%>
From Which <S%G3739><s%> Some, <S%G5100><s%> Having Missed The Mark, <S%G795><s%> Turned Aside <S%G1624><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Vain Talking, <S%G3150><s%>

Wishing <S%G2309><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G3547><s%> Law Teachers, <S%G3361><s%> Understanding <S%G3539><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> They Say, <S%G3004><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> They Strongly Affirm. <S%G1226><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> Now We Know <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Good Is <S%G2570><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Lawfully <S%G3545><s%> Use, <S%G5530><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> For A Righteous One <S%G1342><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Enacted, <S%G2749><s%> <S%G459><s%> But For Lawless <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Insubordinate Ones, <S%G506><s%> For The Ungodly <S%G765><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinful, <S%G268><s%> For The Unholy <S%G462><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Profane, <S%G952><s%> For Smiters Of Fathers <S%G3964><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Smiters Of Mothers; <S%G3389><s%> For Slayers Of Man, <S%G409><s%>

Fornicators, <S%G4205><s%> Abusers Of Themselves With Men, <S%G733><s%> Men Stealers, <S%G405><s%> Liars, <S%G5583><s%> Perjurers, <S%G1965><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any Thing <S%G5100><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Sound <S%G5198><s%> Teaching <S%G1319><s%> Is Opposed, <S%G480><s%>

According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was Entrusted With <S%G4100><s%> I. <S%G1473><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5485><s%> I Thank <S%G2192><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Strengthened <S%G1743><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> He Esteemed, <S%G2233><s%> Appointing Me <S%G5087><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Service, <S%G1248><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Previously <S%G4386><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> A Blasphemer <S%G989><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Persecutor <S%G1376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Insolent; <S%G5197><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> I Was Shewn Mercy, <S%G1653><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Being Ignorant <S%G50><s%> I Did <S%G4160><s%> It In <S%G1722><s%> Unbelief. <S%G570><s%>

<S%G5250><s%> But Superabounded <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Is The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Acceptation <S%G594><s%> Worthy, <S%G514><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> To Save, <S%G4982><s%> Of Whom The <S%G3739><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Am <S%G1510><s%> I. <S%G1473><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G1223><s%> For This Reason <S%G5124><s%> I Was Shewn Mercy, <S%G1653><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me, The <S%G1698><s%> First, <S%G4413><s%> Might Shew Forth <S%G1731><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Whole <S%G3956><s%> Longsuffering, <S%G3115><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> A Delineation <S%G5296><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Believe <S%G4100><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now To The <S%G1161><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages, The <S%G165><s%> Incorruptible, <S%G862><s%> Invisible, <S%G517><s%> Only <S%G3441><s%> Wise <S%G4680><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Charge <S%G3852><s%> I Commit <S%G3908><s%> To Thee, My <S%G4671><s%> Child <S%G5043><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Going Before <S%G4254><s%> As To <S%G1909><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Prophecies, <S%G4394><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Thou Mightest War <S%G4754><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Warfare, <S%G4752><s%>

Holding <S%G2192><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> A Conscience; <S%G4893><s%> Which Conscience <S%G3739><s%> Some, <S%G5100><s%> Having Cast Away, <S%G683><s%> As To <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Made Shipwreck; <S%G3489><s%>

Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Alexander, <S%G223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Satan, <S%G4567><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They May Be Disciplined <S%G3811><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Blaspheme. <S%G987><s%>
